author: holdensd
content:
In relation to EIP-7002, Debaud's audit shows a medium finding "Fee update logic can lead to DoS". 
Having a look at the EIP, the `update_excess_withdrawal_requests()` is only done after processing the execution block, so I guess that this is the expected behaviour and the fee is not updated after each withdrawal request, right?
